Jakarta JSON Binding API v2.0.0
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Interface
jakarta.json.bind.serializer.JsonbSerializer

  • Packages that use JsonbSerializer 
    Package Description
    jakarta.json.bind
    Provides JSON Binding API, which enables binding Java objects from and to JSON documents.
    jakarta.json.bind.annotation
    Defines annotations for customizing the mapping between Java program elements and JSON documents.

    • Uses of JsonbSerializer in jakarta.json.bind

      Methods in jakarta.json.bind with parameters of type JsonbSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      JsonbConfig JsonbConfig.withSerializers​(JsonbSerializer... serializers)
      Property used to specify custom serializers.

    • Uses of JsonbSerializer in jakarta.json.bind.annotation

      Methods in jakarta.json.bind.annotation that return types with arguments of type JsonbSerializer 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Class<? extends JsonbSerializer> value()
      Custom JsonbSerializer which provides custom mapping for given field or JavaBean property.
